system.description:
Heavy armour is predominantly made of metal. The most common types are mail, scale and plate. Mail is made of interlocking metal rings. Scale attaches metal scales to a leather base. Plate consists of breast and back plates, usually paired with mail.

All heavy armour is heavy and noisy. As well as the bonus to Fight rolls, wearing heavy armour gives a -2d penalty to Stealth rolls as well as Athletics rolls for swimming. It also gives a -1d penalty to Athletics rolls to increase movement, jump or climb.
